item.title: ‘Eternity’ Review: Elizabeth Olsen Navigates a Post-Mortem Love Triangle in Pensive, Charming A24 Comedy
item.description: Miles Teller and Callum Turner also star in this glossy, mass-appeal rom-com, which premiered in Toronto before its planned November release.

item.title: Elizabeth Olsen Chooses Between an Afterlife With Miles Teller or Callum Turner in A24’s ‘Eternity’ Trailer
item.description: Da’Vine Joy Randolph and John Early also star in the romantic comedy that premieres at TIFF.

item.title: Michael Jackson Biopic Moves to Spring 2026 Release
item.description: Antoine Fuqua directed the feature ‘Michael’ that stars the pop icon’s nephew Jaafar Jackson.
